children.name: according
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: a
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: all
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: as
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: before
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: but
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: concerning
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: few
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: for
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: from
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: he
children.sourceText: Who is he that shall come?

children.name: his
children.sourceText: Shall he save his people in their sins?

children.name: I
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: if
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: in
children.sourceText: Shall he save his people in their sins?

children.name: it
children.sourceText: Is it the Son of God?

children.name: me
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: of
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: one
children.sourceText: Is there more than one God?

children.name: save
children.sourceText: Shall he save his people in their sins?

children.name: shall
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: than
children.sourceText: Is there more than one God?

children.name: that
children.sourceText: Who is he that shall come?

children.name: the
children.sourceText: Will ye answer the questions which I shall put unto you?

children.name: thee
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: their
children.sourceText: Shall he save his people in their sins?

children.name: there
children.sourceText: Thou sayest there is a true and living God?

children.name: these
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: this
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: thou
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: though
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: thy
children.sourceText: Yea, I believe according to thy words.

children.name: to
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: unto
children.sourceText: Will ye answer the questions which I shall put unto you?

children.name: what
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: which
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: who
children.sourceText: Who is he that shall come?

children.name: will
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: ye
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: yea
children.sourceText: Yea, I believe all the words that thou hast taught.

children.name: yet
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: you
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?
